title: Fish and their characteristics
brief_description: Underwater photography introduces the characteristics of fish and shows how this group of vertebrates is fitted for its environment. Illustrates the variety of form, protective devices and reproductive methods in different types of fish. Distinguishes true fish from other marine animals and studies the freshwater perch as a representative fish.
